main event: Multiple witnesses reported observing a bright light moving in the sky at San Marcos AFB, Texas on 21 July 1952.
interesting points: The sightings involved a bright white light that changed intensity and color, The object was seen at altitudes ranging from 4,000 to 40,000 feet, Several eyewitnesses described the object as round with no jagged edges, The sighting lasted for approximately 5 to 60 seconds, While some witnesses observed the object stop abruptly, others noted it moving rapidly without any sound.
witness description: military personnel including several officers and a squadron member
